posts.post_content:
I have missed about 3 great deals on the Piedmont 42 back. I really want one for the collection. Please PM me offers. Also looking for more Hall of Famers, Southern Leaguers, Rare Backs etc. I have decided to take my collection to the next level. Thank you.
~Wazoo
Good luck in your quest.....one of my favorite backz;)
Sure is a beauty! I just haven't caught a break yet with finding it.

they are tuf, but not impossible.....keep searching, you will find.......sometimes the hunt is part of the fun....:)

wait for the one the you like...if your looking for a clean example, try to get one not stained or paper loss....clean examples are tufer and come at more of a premuim....i personally don't mind beaters if they are not too bad....gona prob run a few hundred....depends on player/condition...i thought erick had one for sale:confused:

Good Luck Wazoo

Thank you! I have started to notice that. I was telling you about that beautiful Piedmont 42, but it had all those pencil marks on it. It sold for $86...so yeah. I also saw Erick's, but that went in a matter of minutes. I was also looking through old threads and saw a Magee (Batting) for $150, it would probably grade a 2. 3 great misses, just gotta keep looking. Thank you once again.

ANYTIME!!

i was going to buy Ericks, but had a few other big purchases out there:(

Erick is one great guy to deal with, he is the man......

If you can get a decent common(1 or 1.5) at $150.00, you did awesome...


so keep searching, trust me, you will find....they are a tufer back than people realize.....i have 14 over the last 12 years or so.....i am collecting the subset which will take my entire life....most are beaters...


the real rush-

tip:


 find one that everyone misses, like an Easter egg hunt....when you get a beater for like  $40.00, it is AWESOME:cool:....just keep looking at ebay listing....takes forever, but very rewarding....:)
